testimonials.quote: Finally a path from bedside nursing to a fulfilling coaching career!
testimonials.name: Sarah M., RN

testimonials.quote: The exam validated everything I learned. Sarah understands nurses so well.
testimonials.name: Michelle K., BSN

questions.question: What is nurse coaching primarily about?

options.text: Using your nursing expertise to empower clients toward holistic health and wellness goals
Performing clinical procedures outside a hospital

questions.question: As a certified nurse coach, your role is to:

options.text: Educate and support clients on lifestyle changes, not replace their medical providers
Perform nursing procedures in a coaching setting
Replace the client's primary care physician

questions.question: In the D.E.P.T.H. Method, what does the "D" stand for?
What is the Warm Market Strategy for finding your first nurse coaching clients?

options.text: List 20 people you know who have mentioned health or wellness struggles

questions.question: What is the recommended starter package price for new nurse coaches?

options.text: Free sessions until you leave your nursing job
